entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to flurries or drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast late in the evening and after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
